title: [Large-Scale] Multimedia-Based Interactive Computer-Assisted Language Learning (CALL) Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language teaching methodologies and proficiency in utilizing digital educational tools
context.additional_context: Enhancing Competency in Designing Effective Language Teaching Methods Using CALL Tools in Mobile Environments for Pre-Service and In-Service Teachers

learning_goals: Learners can implement at least three interactive lesson designs utilizing multimedia content in a CALL environment.
Learners can create flowcharts for mobile microlearning CALL activities with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can distinguish and apply at least five HELP options (e.g., audio feedback, visual cues) for different language acquisition stages.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
